channel.title: CVE Feed for AMD -- 1st Gen AMD EPYC™
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMD -- 1st Gen AMD EPYC™

item.title: CVE-2023-20520|2024-08-02T09:05:36.261Z -- amd -- 1st%20gen%20amd%20epyc%E2%84%A2
item.description: Improper access control settings in ASP Bootloader may allow an attacker to corrupt the return address causing a stack-based buffer overrun potentially leading to arbitrary code execution.
